document_title: Benign goiter: Causes, diagnosis, treatment and prevention
subsection_content: Most cases of benign goiter can be prevented with adequate dietary iodine. Specifically, patients need a diet full of sea fish, fish sauce, iodized salt... and avoid using cabbage, Chinese cabbage, and celery. People should practice a healthy lifestyle (don't stay up late, limit drinking alcohol, beer, smoking, exercise at least 30 minutes a day). Improving overall health and preventing many diseases: diabetes, goiter, hyperthyroidism...
subsection_title: buou co lanh tinh.json. How to prevent benign goiter
subsection_data:
buou co lanh tinh.json. How to prevent benign goiter
Most cases of benign goiter can be prevented with adequate dietary iodine. Specifically, patients need a diet full of sea fish, fish sauce, iodized salt... and avoid using cabbage, Chinese cabbage, and celery. People should practice a healthy lifestyle (don't stay up late, limit drinking alcohol, beer, smoking, exercise at least 30 minutes a day). Improving overall health and preventing many diseases: diabetes, goiter, hyperthyroidism...
